projects.title: rocm_smi_lib
projects.description: Rust crate providing rocm_smi functionalities. Currently supports only device getters/queries. It can be used to make diagnostics applications and/or overclocking software for Radeon products

projects.title: msr_server
projects.description: Exposes cpu statistics (and in future memory) to single file that is updated multiple times per second. It can be used to make some hardware monitorig software. MSR stands for Modular Statistics Reader

projects.title: hwi_rs
projects.description: Hwi_rs was created to give linux gamers and pc enthusiasts some solution for monitoring their hardware (and in future overclocking). It works together with msr_server projects but you don't have to install it separatly because installer for hwi_rs takes care of it automaticly. Currently support for AMD gpu and Intel IGP is limmited and support for Intel ARC doesn't exist, in future it should support every GPU architekture.

projects.title: numberpad_rs
projects.description: User space driver for asus numberpad. It allows user to turn on and off numberpad embeedded into touchpad in some asus laptops. It was currently tested only on UX5401.

projects.title: screenpad_rs
projects.description: Wrapper to Plippo's asus-wmi-screenpad. Screenpad_rs allows user to automaticaly sync brightness for asus screenpad with brightness of main screen, turn it off and on, and set static brightness. In also supports screens in Asus pro duo, however it is currently not tested enougth.

projects.title: euclides
projects.description: Rust crate implementing euclides algorithm for GCD and LCM. Currently works for i32, i64 and i128, so all three most used types of integer in Rust programming language. It can be downloaded via cargo.

projects.title: matrix
projects.description: Rust crate implementing matrices and methods and functions corelated to them. Matrices are generic with restriction to only numeric types.

projects.title: Discord-Programmers-Bot
projects.description: Discord bot that allows to remotly execude programs and returns results of them via discord. It helps me to tutor some younger programmers and show them easly how some algorithms work. Currently I have no budget to host it continously and is hosted only on request

projects.title: Technews
projects.description: My own newspaper on topic of leaks about future pc hardware from different brands, currenlty i took break in writing there caused by lack of free time but I am planning to return to writing.
